page.title: 02Wildlife Preservation Trust
page.content:
The Jersey Wildlife Preservation Trust has four main aims{conservation, {research, education}and{recreation.} It has members all over the world.
The Zoo was founded by{ Gerald {Durrell}at Les Augres Manor in l963. It covers 2O acres has 5O employees. They clean cages and feed the animals while some run the business side. There is a full time education officer who works at the trust and in schools.
The animals are expensive to feed so that people who wish to help can give money by adopting animals. This costs between Â£2O and Â£3OO depending on size of animal. The junior section of the trust is called the{Dodo Club.}Members receive three posters every year as well as free admission.
